description: 200 Front-end / Web / JavaScript / Mobile / IoT developers and decision makers
Mostly from the greater New York area
faqs: When is the next HalfStack NYC?
The short answer: Sometime in 2024. We'll let you know as soon as we know more.
HalfStack NYC is being hosted in lower Manhattan
If you are not local to NYC, we recommend staying in the financial district near the World Trade Center
schedule: Plan to arrive between 9:00 and 9:30am on the date of the event & stay late for an amazing day of JavaScript web goodness!

description: Digital twin is a trending buzzword at large industrial companies. But what is it? Through a concrete, small-scale application, you will learn how you can — but probably shouldn’t — build digital twins around your home. We will look at the required steps and tools you can use to build your own, taking the example of a door and how its digital twin can enable predictive maintenance operations. Throughout the talk, we will reflect on the DevOps challenges created by the physical components of a system.
sessions.title: Over-engineering your home with digital twins
